attributes.action: Give SENDIST more powers to act when an LEA is at fault
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
SENDIST hearings mean they are witnesses to many Local Education Authorities not acting in the best interests of children with Special Educational Needs, for example using  possible "Blanket policies" when deciding whether to undertake statutory assessments and statements.
We feel SENDIST should be able to act when witness to possible maladministration rather than parents having to go through hearings and then also having to contact the Ombudsman.

government_responses.details:
